title: Богиня сыска
overview: Goddess of Detection is a romantic experiment about searching and dating. Will the bachelor be able to choose a girl by the appearance of her apartment? He will study everything - clothes, books, the contents of closets and shelves. But will the girl agree to a date after a return search at the guy's home? Bloggers Ilya Kuruch, Vika Chuma, and fashion expert Daniil Grachev will comment on what is happening.
